attributes.action: Work with the the governments of Uganda and Congo to remove the Lord's Resistance Army.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The Lord's Resistance Army is guerilla army based in central Africa. For many decades they have attacked, sexually assaulted and murder countless civilians in Uganda and Congo. The international community has failed to deal with problem so I ask that the British government applies international help and pressure where needed to solve this problem.
